00001 ï»¿using System;
00002 using System.Linq;
00003 using System.Collections.Generic;
00004 using System.Text;
00005 using System.Collections.Specialized;
00006 using System.IO;
00007 using System.Reflection;
00008 using System.Xml;
00009 
00010 namespace Tripi
00011 {
00015     static class MobileConfiguration
00016     {
00020         public static NameValueCollection Settings;
00021 
00025         static MobileConfiguration()
00026         {
00027             string appPath = Path.GetDirectoryName(Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().GetName().CodeBase);
00028             string configFile = Path.Combine(appPath, "app.config");
00029 
00030             if (!File.Exists(configFile))
00031             {
00032                 throw new FileNotFoundException(string.Format("Application configuration file '{0}' not found.", configFile));
00033             }
00034 
00035             XmlDocument xmlDocument = new XmlDocument();
00036             xmlDocument.Load(configFile);
00037             XmlNodeList nodeList = xmlDocument.GetElementsByTagName("appSettings");
00038             Settings = new NameValueCollection();
00039 
00040             foreach (XmlNode node in nodeList)
00041             {
00042                 foreach (XmlNode key in node.ChildNodes)
00043                 {
00044                     Settings.Add(key.Attributes["key"].Value, key.Attributes["value"].Value);
00045                 }
00046             }
00047         }
00048 
00052         public static string WCFAddress
00053         {
00054             get { return Settings["WCServiceAddress"]; }
00055         }
00056 
00060         public static int DefaultSendFrequency
00061         {
00062             get
00063             {
00064                 try
00065                 {
00066                     return Convert.ToInt32(Settings["DefaultSendFrequency"]);
00067                 }
00068                 catch
00069                 {
00070                     return 3000;
00071                 }
00072             }
00073         }
00074     }
00075 }
